name: Centella Calming Daily Sunscreen
description: Boasting SPF50+ PA++++ sun protection, this organic sunscreen is enriched with 49% centella asistica extract to soothe heated skin while keeping harmful UV rays at bay. Chemical sunscreen in a cream texture contains beta-glucan and adenosine for moisturizing and anti-wrinkle benefits. The unscented and non-sticky formula leaves a natural finish without a white cast.
